text_block_list.text: Ah, McQueen!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan

text_block_list.text:
Ryan and Bright, are you 
planning to start training now too?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
Yes, The [Hanshin Daishoten] is 
approaching so it's time to dive in～
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright

text_block_list.text: Spe-chan over there is going to enter too, right?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan

text_block_list.text: Yes, as a warm-up before the [Spring Tenno Sho].
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
So it's finally our first shot at the 
"Golden Generation's" Derby Uma Musume, huh～?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan

text_block_list.text:
We had the opportunity to see her previous race, 
and it was a very deeply moving experience～.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright

text_block_list.text:
……However, no matter who my opponent is, right now the only thing 
I need to do is continue to refine myself.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright

text_block_list.text:
Bright was last year's [Hanshin Daishoten] champion, 
and then went on to conquer the [Spring Tenno Sho].
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan

text_block_list.text:
Victory is natural ― is the frame of mind 
we'll be approaching this with.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright

text_block_list.text: …… certainly with the dignity of a champion, I see.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
Well then, let's get started with training. 
See ya later, McQueen!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan

text_block_list.text: Good day to you～.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright

text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san and Special Week-san, it seems you won't be able to 
afford letting your opponent take advantage of any mistakes.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
Special Week's next races was quickly approaching. It was about 
time we put the finishing touches on her preparations, however……
Haa…… Haa…
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text: …For something of this level to wear you out, it's not like you.
text_block_list.name: Narita Brian

text_block_list.text: …I-I'm sorry……
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
After a quick break, let's give it one more 
go! [Repetition becomes strength]! I don't know 
if there's a saying like that though!
text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket

text_block_list.text: Yes, please……
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
As I thought, Silence Suzuka's situation seems 
to be weighing on her mind. She continues to 
be unable to focus on running, it seems.
Trainer-san, excuse me.
text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna

text_block_list.text: Tazuna-san, how may I help you?
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Yes, the [Monthly Twinkle] has requested to do an article. It 
seems they'd like to put together a special report about team .
text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna

text_block_list.text: Hey hey hey! [Monthly Twinkle] really gets it, huh?!
text_block_list.name: Gold Ship

text_block_list.text: Being part of a special report, sounds amazing……!
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
Fufuu, well then, I've been entrusted with a questionnaire 
for each of the team members, so I'll have them 
sent to the trainer's room later.
text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna

text_block_list.text: Thank you very much, I appreciate it.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Oh, and one more thing― truthfully, there's a former trainer 
who's had experience overseas that happens to be on campus.
text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna

text_block_list.text:
And when I spoke with them about Silence Suzuka, 
they said they'd love to take a look at her running.
text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna

text_block_list.text:
That's quite fortunate, isn't it? 
Perhaps we'll be able to get some advice.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Suzuka, since we have the chance, 
how about having them take a look at your running?
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: Yes, I look forward to it.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text: Suzuka-san……!!
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text: Spe-chan……?
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text: ……Ah, um… no, it's nothing…
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
On the course right now, Silence Suzuka was running, 
in order to get some advice from a former trainer 
who had experience overseas.
Watching her from afar, was Special Week.
So you were here, Spe.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: So you were here, Spe.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: Trainer-san……
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
I surprised even myself. About Suzuka-san, 
without thinking I almost tried to stop her……
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
Since you've come to the academy, you've been together with 
Suzuka-san the whole time, after all. I think it's only natural 
that you'd be anxious.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Since you've come to the academy, you've been together with 
Suzuka-san the whole time, after all. I think it's only natural 
that you'd be anxious.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
……Even now I remember it very clearly. 
The first time I saw Suzuka-san's running figure.
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
Coming here all the way from Hokkaido, unsure whether things 
would even go well, I saw Suzuka-san running―
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
Like they were being drawn strongly to her, 
I couldn't take my eyes off of her.
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
Ever since then, I've wanted to be able to run 
like Suzuka-san, and I've continued to watch her, but……
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text: After saying all that, Special Week feel silent.

It seems she herself, realized just how heavily she was relying 
on Silence Suzuka's running to support herself.
She turned her gaze towards Silence Suzuka on the course―

When I first laid eyes on Silence Suzuka's running, 
I couldn't help but get the impression that she 
was an Uma Musume who enjoyed running.

Before long, she found her own running style, and her 
running exceeded the expectations of everyone who saw her……

……Spe, you were drawn to Suzuka's running 
because you wanted to be like that, right?
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: ……Yes.
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text: Then, what exactly about Suzuka's running drew you to it?
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Eh……? What? That's… 
because it's pretty and cool……
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
And it gave you a dream. You thought about 
what kind of run she would show us next time too.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Yeah……! That's right! Suzuka-san's running 
always exceeded my expectations!
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
That's why, more and more, I wanted to keep watching 
Suzuka-san run! Her consecutive victories at [Osaka 
Hai] and the [Takarazuka Kinen], and then―
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text: Ah……
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
For her dream of "Wanting to see 
the scenery", Suzuka continues to run.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Because Suzuka is running with those 
straight-forward feelings, me and Spe are both drawn to her.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Because Suzuka is running with those 
straight-forward feelings, me and Spe are both drawn to her.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
……if Suzuka goes over seas, she'll probably 
show us an even more extraordinary run than before.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
……if Suzuka goes over seas, she'll probably 
show us an even more extraordinary run than before.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: ……that's right, of course that'll be what happens……!
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
Suzuka-san will run to the ends of the Earth! 
All of our expectations, she'll easily blow them all away!
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
That's the way that the Suzuka-san I look up 
to runs…… ……Something like stopping Suzuka-san…… 
I can't do something like that……!
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
Just like Suzuka― to catch up to 
Suzuka, Spe you need to work hard.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Just like Suzuka― to catch up to 
Suzuka, Spe you need to work hard.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: Ehehe…… Yeah!
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
The stands are packed here at the Hanshin Race course. With the 
Main Race approaching, the enthusiasm in the air begins to swell!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text:
All the attention is on the "Golden Generation's" 
Special Week and last year's champion, Mejiro Bright!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text:
With the [Hanshin Daishoten] being the first time these 
two face off, just what kind of result awaits us?!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text:
Rainy with a Heavy course…… I need to focus on preserving stamina 
in this race…… I definitely need to avoid rushing at the start……
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
Yeah, that's fine. Most likely, the pace will be 
somewhat slow, so it'll be easy to focus on those in the front.
text_block_list.name: Narita Brian

text_block_list.text: Hmm hmm… I see……!
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
The straight on the Hanshin 3000m, isn't very long 
and there's a hill too. So go all out from the third corner!
text_block_list.name: Gold Ship

text_block_list.text:
……Um… Gold Ship-san's advice, 
it's really hard to tell if you're joking or serious…
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
How rude! When you think of the 
[Hanshin Daishoten] it's gotta be me, right?!
text_block_list.name: Gold Ship

text_block_list.text:
Before you start spouting off about the [Hanshin Daishoten], 
you should probably debut first!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
With that said, to think her flight would be the same day as the 
race, it's unfortunate Suzuka-san couldn't be here……
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
Ah, no! I'm the one that suggested 
that she should leave today.
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
So Suzuka-san can leave and run overseas with peace of mind― 
I'll show Suzuka-san that even if we're apart, I can still do it!
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
So that's how it was. In that case, 
you definitely have to win, don't you?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
Yeah, right now Spe has everyone's feelings backing her up. 
Roll up your sleeves and respond in kind.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Yeah, right now Spe has everyone's feelings backing her up. 
Roll up your sleeves and respond in kind.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: Yeah! I'll be heading out!
text_block_list.name: Special Week
